svg:
<rect x="5" y="5" style="stroke-width: 5px;" stroke="<%= getRegistry('borderColor') || 'black'%>" width="390" height="190" fill="<%= getRegistry('color') || 'white'%>"/>
    <text fill="<%= getRegistry('textColor') || 'black'%>" x="200" y="50"
          style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 40px; text-anchor: middle" stroke="#000000"><%=
        getAttribute('name')
    %>
<%
        var childrenIds = getChildrenIds(),
        child, i, xOffset=300, yOffset=30,
        nameText,
        maxChildren = childrenIds.length > 6 ? 6 : childrenIds.length;

        for(i=0; i 200 ? 100 : 300;
            yOffset += xOffset === 100 ? 50 : 0;
            child = getNode(childrenIds[i]);
            if(child){%>
    <text fill="black" x="<%=xOffset%>" y="<%=yOffset%>"
          style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 30px; text-anchor: middle"><%=
        child.getAttribute('name')
    %>
<%
            }
        }
%>
